# Install Docs

## How to install

- [Install on Windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/windows.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Windows.
- [Install on macOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/macos.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on macOS.
- [Upgrade to a new .NET version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/upgrade.md): Learn how to upgrade an app to a new .NET version. Upgrade .NET when the current version goes out of support or when you want to use new features of .NET. Control versions of SDK, analyzers, and packages for predictable builds.
- [Remove outdated runtimes and SDKs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/remove-runtime-sdk-versions.md): This article describes how to uninstall .NET on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Uninstall .NET manually, through a package manager, or with the .NET Uninstall Tool.
- [Manage .NET templates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/templates.md): Learn how to install .NET templates on Windows, Linux, and macOS. Templates are installed from NuGet, a NuGet package file, or a file system directory.
- [macOS Notarization issues](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/macos-notarization-issues.md): How to handle notarization and certificate problems with macOS when you install the .NET runtime, SDK, and apps built with .NET.
- [Troubleshoot .NET Package mix ups on Linux](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-package-mixup.md): Learn about how to troubleshoot strange .NET package errors on Linux. These errors may occur when you run the dotnet command.
- [How to check .NET versions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/how-to-detect-installed-versions.md): Learn how to list which versions of .NET are installed on your computer. This includes the .NET runtime and SDK.

## Install on Linux

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux.md): Learn about how .NET is available on Linux. .NET can be installed through a package manager, a snap package, or manually.
- [Alpine](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-alpine.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Alpine.
- [Debian](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-debian.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Debian.
- [Fedora](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-fedora.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Fedora.
- [OpenSUSE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-opensuse.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on openSUSE Leap.
- [Red Hat Enterprise Linux](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-rhel.md): Learn about which versions of .NET are supported, and how to install .NET on Red Hat Enterprise Linux and CentOS Stream.
- [SLES](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-sles.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on SUSE Enterprise Linux (SLES).
- [Installation script & binaries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-scripted-manual.md): Demonstrates how to install the .NET SDK and the .NET Runtime on Linux without a package manager. Use the install script or manually extract the binaries.

## Install with Snap

- [Runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-snap-runtime.md): Learn about how to install the .NET Runtime snap package. Canonical maintains and supports .NET-related snap packages.
- [SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-snap-sdk.md): Learn about how to install the .NET SDK snap package. Canonical maintains and supports .NET-related snap packages.

## Ubuntu

- [Install](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-ubuntu-install.md): Demonstrates the various ways to install .NET SDK and .NET Runtime on Ubuntu. .NET is usually installed through APT.
- [Decision guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/install/linux-ubuntu-decision.md): Learn about the ways you can install .NET on Ubuntu, either from the built-in package feed, the .NET backports repository, or the Microsoft repository.
